channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canadian farmers reel as China blocks top canola seed market
UK foreign minister faces fine after JD Vance fishing trip licence error
Kroger’s CEO mysteriously resigned. An unrelated lawsuit involving Jewel could reveal why
Chinese fighter 'intercepts' Philippine plane over disputed shoal, Manila says
Tennessee town approves deals to turn closed prison into immigration detention facility
item.description: Officials in a rural Tennessee town have voted to approve agreements to turn a former prison into an immigration detention facility operated by a priv...

item.title: US briefly deploys 2 warships to a disputed South China Sea shoal after Chinese collision
item.description: The United States has deployed two warships to the disputed South China Sea near Scarborough Shoal

item.title: Miami’s Freedom Tower reopens as Trump ramps up arrests in city of Cuban migrant pride
item.description: Miami’s Freedom Tower stood as a beacon of hope for Cubans fleeing communist rule at the height of the Cold War

item.title: Parents, child killed when tree falls on car as heavy rain and flooding hit Tennessee
item.description: An official says a mother, father and child were killed when a tree fell on their car as heavy rain and flooding hit Tennessee

item.title: Canada's Gildan will buy HanesBrands for $2.2 billion
item.description: Canada's Gildan will buy HanesBrands for $2.2 billion
